header.slogan: We help you find your lost pet!

home.title: Welcome to SOS Pets
home.text: This site publishes searches for lost pets, publishes found pets and other services for animals
home.textImg1: Look it up in the list of found pets.
home.textImg2: Register and publish to find its owner.
home.titleImg3: Do you want to publish a search?
home.textImg3: Register, publish and someone will give you information to find your pet.
home.servCareText: In this service we give people the possibility to offer to take care of an animal, without any conditions. If you need someone to take care of your pet, enter the list of nominated people. If you want to apply, register and followed the steps to do so.
home.servTransitText: With this service we try to get you to apply if you have physical space for a transit home for an animal or that you can find someone available for any animal.
home.serTransportText: Do not you have how to move your pet? Do not worry, in this service we give you the possibility of contacting someone near your home to help you move your pet. If you want to apply to offer this service, you only have to register.
